freenet.clients.http
Class ConnectionsToadlet

java.lang.Object
  freenet.clients.http.Toadlet
      freenet.clients.http.ConnectionsToadlet
Direct Known Subclasses:
DarknetConnectionsToadlet, OpennetConnectionsToadlet
public abstract class ConnectionsToadlet
extends Toadlet

Base class for DarknetConnectionsToadlet and OpennetConnectionsToadlet

getPeerListTitle

protected abstract String getPeerListTitle()
What should the heading (before "(more detailed)") be on the peers table?

showPeerActionsBox

protected abstract boolean showPeerActionsBox()
Should there be a checkbox for each peer, and drawPeerActionSelectBox() be called directly after drawing the peers list?

drawPeerActionSelectBox

protected abstract void drawPeerActionSelectBox(HTMLNode peerForm,
                                                boolean advancedModeEnabled)
If showPeerActionsBox() is true, this will be called directly after drawing the peers table. A form has been added, and checkboxes added for each peer. This function should draw the rest of the form - any additional controls and one or more submit buttons.

shouldDrawNoderefBox

protected abstract boolean shouldDrawNoderefBox(boolean advancedModeEnabled)

getPageTitle

protected abstract String getPageTitle(String titleCountString,
                                       String myName)

drawAddPeerBox

protected void drawAddPeerBox(HTMLNode contentNode,
                              ToadletContext ctx)
Draw the add a peer box. This comes immediately after the main peers table and before the noderef box. Implementors may skip it by not doing anything in this method.
